description.value:
The Prescription Authority Type value set includes values that indicate the prescription authority type under Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme (PBS) prescribing requirements.
This value set will be submitted to HL7 Australia for inclusion in the [HL7 AU Base Implementation Guide](http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/). If accepted, this GP NAPS content will be replaced with HL7 Australia content.
